description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Withholding_Tax_ExemptionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Withholding_Tax_ExemptionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Withholding_Tax_ExemptionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the Withholding Tax Exemption Object being updated. For new Withholding Tax Exemption Objects, this will not exist

Resource_ProviderObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Resource_ProviderObjectID.type: WID,  Contingent_Worker_ID,  External_Sourceable_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_Reference_ID,  Supplier_ID,  Supplier_Reference_ID
Resource_ProviderObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Resource_ProviderObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: Supplier for the Withholding Tax Exemption.

Tax_RateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Tax_RateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Tax_RateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: Withholding Tax Rate for which the Withholding Tax Exemption applies to.

validation.validation: Enter a Withholding Tax Rate that does not have Progressive Rate Threshholds.
Withholding Tax Exemptions don't apply on Withholding Tax Rates with a realization point of Customer Invoice Self Withholding.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: The effective tax percentage that will override the Withholding Tax Rate after the Withholding Tax Exemption is applied.

validation.validation: Enter an Effective Tax Rate Percentage after exemption that is between 0% and 100%.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: Date on which the Withholding Tax Exemption begins effect.

validation.validation: Enter an Exemption Start Date that is before the Exemption End Date.
You have more than 1 active withholding tax exemption for the same withholding tax rate(s); enter only 1 withholding tax exemption for a specified effective date range.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: Date for which the Withholding Tax Exemption stops effect.

validation.validation: Enter an Exemption Start Date that is before the Exemption End Date.
You have more than 1 active withholding tax exemption for the same withholding tax rate(s); enter only 1 withholding tax exemption for a specified effective date range.

Withholding_Tax_Exemption_Data.description: Inactive Tax Exemption denotes whether or not the Withholding Tax Exemption is inactive.

description: Element containing data for the Withholding Tax Exemption Object.

validation.validation: You can't change the Supplier, Tax Rate, Effective Tax Percentage, Start Date, or End Date because this tax exemption is already in use: [Tax Exemption].
